S044X.FORM.  1. S-044T - TOTAL SAMPLE 2. S-0XXX - CROSS-SECTION 3. S-044I - INFANTRY
S044X.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRADE?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT (ANY GRADE) OR TECHNICIAN 3RD OR 4TH GRADE 0. NO ANSWER

S044X.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  1. 19 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 20 YEARS 3. 21 TO 24 YEARS 4. 25 TO 27 YEARS 5. 28 TO 29 YEARS 6. 30 TO 34 YEARS 7. 35 TO 37 YEARS 8. 38 YEARS OR OLDER 0. NO ANSWER
S044X.Q3. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED 4. SEPARATED 5. WIDOWED 0. NO ANSWER

S044X.Q4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE? E. SECTION:  01. NEW ENGLAND: CONNECTICUT, MAINE, MASSACHUSETTS, NEW HAMPSHIRE, RHODE ISLAND, VERMONT 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC: NEW JERSEY, NEW YORK, PENNSYLVANIA 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL: ILLINOIS, INDIANA, MICHIGAN, OHIO, WISCONSIN 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL: IOWA, KANSAS, MINNESOTA, MISSOURI, NEBRASKA, NORTH DAKOTA, SOUTH DAKOTA 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC: DELAWARE, DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, FLORIDA, GEORGIA, MARYLAND, NORTH CAROLINA, SOUTH CAROLINA, VIRGINIA, WEST VIRGINIA 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL: ALABAMA, KENTUCKY, MISSISSIPPI, TENNESSEE 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL: ARKANSAS, LOUISIANA, OKLAHOMA, TEXAS 08. MOUNTAIN: ARIZONA, COLORADO, IDAHO, MONTANA, NEVADA, NEW MEXICO, UTAH, WYOMING 09. PACIFIC: CALIFORNIA, OREGON, WASHINGTON 10. FOREIGN - U.S. POSSESSION 11. FOREIGN - NOT U.S. 12. U.S. - STATE NOT SPECIFIED 00. NO ANSWER
S044X.Q5. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARMY?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 0. NO ANSWER

S044X.Q6. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY? E. IF YOU HAVE SERVED PREVIOUSLY IN THE ARMY, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE A NATIONAL GUARDSMAN, GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT ENTERED THE ARMY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS

S044X.Q7. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING BEFORE YOU ENTERED THE ARMY?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE)

S044X.Q8. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE
S044X.Q9. ARE YOU LIMITED SERVICE?  1. YES, I AM LIMITED SERVICE 2. NO, I AM NOT LIMITED SERVICE 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S044X.Q12. WHICH PART OF THE ARMY IS YOUR OUTFIT IN?  1. ARMY GROUND FORCES (A.G.F.) 2. ARMY AIR FORCES (A.A.F.) 3. ARMY SERVICE FORCES (A.S.F. - FORMERLY SERVICES OF SUPPLY, S.O.S.) 4. DEFENSE COMMAND 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S044X.Q20. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE IN?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S044X.Q20A. WHY WOULD YOU CHOOSE THIS BRANCH? E. PERSONAL MOTIVATION:  1. FITTED FOR THE WORK: PREVIOUS TRAINING, EXPERIENCE AND EDUCATION; KNOW MOST ABOUT IT (EMPHASIS ON PREVIOUS TRAINING) 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q20A. WHY WOULD YOU CHOOSE THIS BRANCH? E. PERSONAL MOTIVATION:  91 1. USEFUL IN PEACE TIME OR IN CIVILIAN LIFE; CHANCE TO LEARN SOMETHING (EMPHASIS ON TRAINING FOR FUTURE) 909 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q20A. WHY WOULD YOU CHOOSE THIS BRANCH? E. PERSONAL MOTIVATION:  38 1. CHANCE FOR ADVANCEMENT; CHANCE FOR PROMOTION (AS A PERSONAL AIM; NOT FOR DOING MOST FOR WAR EFFORT) 962 2. NOT CHOSEN

S044X.Q20A. WHY WOULD YOU CHOOSE THIS BRANCH? E. PERSONAL MOTIVATION:  386 1. LIKES THE WORK, OR CONNECTED DUTIES; DESIRABLE WORK; INTERESTED IN WORK OR EQUIPMENT; LIKES CERTAIN JOB IN THIS BRANCH (NO CONNECTION WITH TRAINING; JUST LIKES THE WORK) 614 2. NOT CHOSEN

S044X.Q20A. WHY WOULD YOU CHOOSE THIS BRANCH? E. PERSONAL MOTIVATION:  43 1. CHANCE TO SEE ACTION; HAS EXCITEMENT; GETS INTO COMBAT OR FIGHTING (EMPHASIS ON PERSONAL AIMS; NO IMPLICATION OF BEING BEST FOR WAR EFFORT) 957 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q20A. WHY WOULD YOU CHOOSE THIS BRANCH? E. PERSONAL MOTIVATION:  7 1. IT IS MOST HIGHLY THOUGHT OF; OTHERS RECOMMENDED IT TO ME 993 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q20A. WHY WOULD YOU CHOOSE THIS BRANCH? E. PERSONAL MOTIVATION:  1 1. IT IS SAFEST; LEAST DANGEROUS 999 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q20A. WHY WOULD YOU CHOOSE THIS BRANCH? E. PERSONAL MOTIVATION:  7 1. EASIEST WORK; SOFTEST; "GOLDBRICK" 993 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q20A. WHY WOULD YOU CHOOSE THIS BRANCH? E. PERSONAL MOTIVATION:  16 1. INDIVIDUAL'S PHYSICAL CAPACITY; "I AM IN LIMITED SERVICE"; "I DON'T HAVE STRENGTH TO DO COMBAT WORK" 984 2. NOT CHOSEN

S044X.Q21. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANCE?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S044X.Q22. WHAT WOULD YOU SAY WAS MORE IMPORTANT TO YOU PERSONALLY - THE PARTICULAR KIND OF JOB YOU GET TO DO, OR THE BRANCH OF THE ARMY YOU GET INTO?  1. THE KIND OF JOB I GET 2. THE BRANCH OF THE ARMY I GET INTO 3. IT MAKES NO DIFFERENCE 4. BOTH ARE EQUALLY IMPORTANT 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER X. COL. 80 NOT USED. CARD 2

S044X.Q38A. WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE DRAFTED FIRST?  1. MARRIED MEN WITH CHILDREN, NOT MAKING WAR MATERIALS 2. SINGLE MEN MAKING WAR MATERIALS 0. NO ANSWER
S044X.Q38B. WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE DRAFTED FIRST?  1. SINGLE MEN MAKING WAR MATERIALS 2. SINGLE MEN WORKING ON FARMS 0. NO ANSWER
S044X.Q38C. WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE DRAFTED FIRST?  1. MARRIED MEN WITH CHILDREN, NOT MAKING WAR MATERIALS 2. SINGLE MEN WORKING ON FARMS 0. NO ANSWER

S044X.Q39. GRANTING THAT BOTH OF THESE THINGS ARE IMPORTANT, WHICH ONE IS MOST IMPORTANT TO DO RIGHT NOW - INCREASE THE SIZE OF OUR ARMED FORCES, OR INCREASE THE NUMBER OF FARM AND WAR WORKERS?  1. INCREASE SIZE OF ARMED FORCES 2. INCREASE NUMBER OF FARM AND WAR WORKERS 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  1. MOST IMPORTANT WORK; MOST IMPORTANT IN WINNING THE WAR (EMPHASIS ON MOST) 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  125 1. IMPORTANT (NO "MOST"); OTHERS DEPEND ON IT; SPECIFIC DUTIES ARE NECESSARY; IT IS NECESSARY 875 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  18 1. BECAUSE OF WHAT IT HAS DONE UP TO NOW; BEST RECORD SO FAR (EMPHASIS ON "SO FAR") 982 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  89 1. SIMPLE STATEMENT OF FUNCTIONS WITHOUT ANY REFERENCE TO IMPORTANCE 911 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  27 1. IT IS HIGHEST OR BEST OR SUPERIOR (NO REASON GIVEN SUCH AS "IMPORTANT" OR "I LIKE IT") 973 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  76 1. MOST DANGEROUS; HAS MOST COMBAT 924 2. NOT CHOSEN

S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  34 1. DOES THE HARDEST WORK; HARD WORK; ROUGH LIFE (BUT NO WORDS "DANGER" OR "COMBAT" OR "FIGHTING") 966 2. NOT CHOSEN

S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  11 1. RUNS MOST EFFICIENTLY; "SATISFIED WITH WAY THINGS ARE REGULATED AND PUT IN ORDER"; "LIKES THE WAY THEY WORK" (EMPHASIS ON ORGANIZATION) 989 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  21 1. MOST ADVANCED; UP-TO-DATE, MODERN (IN EQUIPMENT OR ACTIVITY, NOT ORGANIZATION) 979 2. NOT CHOSEN
S044X.Q49A. WHY DO YOU THINK MOST HIGHLY OF THIS BRANCH? E. ALTRUISTIC MOTIVATION:  8 1. COOPERATION BETWEEN MEN AND OFFICERS; MEN OR UNITS WORK TOGETHER 992 2. NOT CHOSEN

S044X.V60. EDUCATION, INFORMATION TEST SCORE AND LONGEVITY IN THE ARMY SCORE X. IDENTIFICATION OF GROUPS RESULTING FROM A CROSS-SECTION TABULATION OF EDUCATION, INFORMATION TEST SCORE AND LONGEVITY IN THE ARMY. UNEDUCATED = LESS THAN H.S. GRADUATE EDUCATED = H.S. GRADUATE AND ABOVE SHORT = 1 YEAR OR LESS IN ARMY LONG = MORE THAN 1 YEAR IN ARMY UNINFORMED = SCORE OF 51 OR LESS INFORMED = SCORE OF 52 OR MORE  1. UNEDUCATED: SHORT: UNINFORMED 2. UNEDUCATED: SHORT: INFORMED 3. UNEDUCATED: LONG: UNINFORMED 4. UNEDUCATED: LONG: INFORMED 5. EDUCATED: SHORT: UNINFORMED 6. EDUCATED: SHORT: INFORMED 7. EDUCATED: LONG: UNINFORMED 8.
